text: Many municipalities in Germany are "twin towns" (usually in Europe) or "sister cities" (usually in the rest of the world) with local communities in other countries, or in other parts of Germany (mostly across the previous inner German border). Below are lists of these municipalities and the communities they are paired with. ==Lists== *List of twin towns and sister cities in Germany (A-E) *List of twin towns and sister cities in Germany (F-L) *List of twin towns and sister cities in Germany (M-Z) Category:Settlements in Germany
title: List of twin towns and sister cities in Germany
